sourcesContent:
import React from "react"
import { Box, Button, Grid, Heading, Stack, Image } from "@chakra-ui/react"
import Webcam from "react-webcam"

const Atendimento = () => {
  const webcamRef = React.useRef(null)
  const images = []
  const capture = React.useCallback(() => {
    console.log("err", images)
    const imageSrc = webcamRef.current?.getScreenshot()
    images.push(imageSrc)
  }, [webcamRef])

  return (
    <Box flex="1" w="100%" flexDir="row" p="6" mb={6}>
      <Box borderRadius="10" bg="gray.500" w="100%" mb={6} p={2}>
        <Heading as="h2" size="lg" fontWeight="normal">
          Paciente: Victor Mesquita
        </Heading>
      </Box>
      <Grid templateColumns="repeat(2, 1fr)" gap={5} px={4} h="100%">
        <Box borderRadius="10">
          <Webcam audio={false} ref={webcamRef} screenshotFormat="image/jpeg" />
          <Box py={2}>
            <Button onClick={() => capture()}>Capturar Imagem</Button>
          </Box>
        </Box>
        <Box bg="gray.500" h="100%" borderRadius="10" p={6}>
          <Stack direction="column">
            <Image boxSize="200px" src={images[0]} alt="Dan Abramov" />
          </Stack>
        </Box>
      </Grid>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default Atendimento
